net.kuujo.vertigo.util

Class CountingCompletionHandler<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.vertigo.util.CountingCompletionHandler<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<T>>

    public class CountingCompletionHandler<T>
extends Object
implements org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<T>>
    A copy of the Vert.x core counting completion handler for handling multiple remote calls asynchronously.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

        Sets the completion handler.
        Parameters:
